text: وَيَقُولُونَ سُبْحَـٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِن كَانَ وَعْدُ رَبِّنَا لَمَفْعُولًا

translation.en.sahih: And they say, "Exalted is our Lord! Indeed, the promise of our Lord has been fulfilled."
translation.id.indonesian: dan mereka berkata: "Maha Suci Tuhan kami, sesungguhnya janji Tuhan kami pasti dipenuhi".
